How many Rust crew members filed a civil lawsuit against Alec Baldwin and the film's producers?
Three
What are the crew members' positions?
dolly operator, set costumer, and key grip
What are the names of the crew members?
Ross Addiego, Doran Curtin, and Reese Price
Which production companies are named in the lawsuit?
El Dorado Pictures and Rust Movie Productions LLC
What are the accusations against the defendants in the lawsuit?
negligence and intentional infliction of emotional distress
What symptoms do the crew members claim they suffer from?
insomnia, anxiety, depression, and symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder
What charges were brought against Alec Baldwin in January?
two counts of involuntary manslaughter
How did Alec Baldwin plead in response to the charges?
not guilty
What safety rule did New Mexico prosecutors say Alec Baldwin ignored?
the first rule of gun safety
What did the crew members claim they were not offered by the producers?
meaningful emotional or mental health services
